title: Tips for people from France
body: Bonjour, I was wondering if anyone could recommend places for me to visit while I'm in London
replies: Visit Buckingham Palace! The guardsmen are as stiff as the French
I would recommend vising covent garden...they have some nice restaurants you might appreciate!
Do you like to shop? Visit Oxford Circus...maybe ride a red bus

title: The London Eye
body: Hi I recently visited the London Eye and thought it was amazing! We were lucky to have a beautiful clear day.
replies: I wasn't so lucky when I visited :(
Did you go on the Thames River Cruise? I recommend doing them both as they are in the same location.
The London Eye is just an overpriced ferris wheel...not worth the money!!

title: The Shard
body: We stayed in the Shangri-La Suite and it just about met my high standards
replies: You sound like a right snob!
We had dinner in the Ting restaurant...highly recommended
The view from the Shard is a great experience!

title: The O2 Arena
body: The O2 doesn't seem to be as good as when it first opened
replies: Walking over the O2 was a memorable experience...rather windy though!
